content.introduction: ConfigMaps allow you to decouple configuration artifacts from image content to keep containerized applications portable.

sections.title: Creating ConfigMaps
sections.content: ConfigMaps can be created from literal values, files, or directories.

codeExamples.code:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: app-config
data:
  database_url: "postgres://localhost:5432/mydb"
  log_level: "info"
codeExamples.explanation: This ConfigMap stores application configuration as key-value pairs.

content.summary: ConfigMaps provide a way to inject configuration data into your applications without hardcoding values.
